name: Trio Ball
description:
A completely addicted and collapse of the leisure class puzzles.

Game has no time limit, but the players need to keep calm, not irritable mood,otherwise death is in the moment.

The rhythm of the trio is not complicated, the game interface timing to different colored squares,players need to be synchronized control to three small ball,At the same time of calm,players need clever and flexible by touching the screen to rotate the direction of the three goals and incorporated the same color of the square.
